name: bridge-web-app
description: Top-level package.json for running scripts across all projects in monorepo

scripts.start.projects: npm run start && npm run logs.projects || true
scripts.start.services: sudo docker-compose up -d bridge_postgres bridge_test_postgres bridge_redis
scripts.logs.services: docker-compose logs --tail=1000 -f bridge_postgres bridge_test_postgres bridge_redis || true
